titles.title: Energy Technology Maturation Act of 2019
Energy Technology Maturation Act of 2019
Energy Technology Maturation Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to facilitate the commercialization of energy and related technologies developed at Department of Energy facilities with promising commercial potential.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski under authority of the order of the Senate of 08/01/2019 without amendment. With written report No. 116-76.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 178.

bill.summary:
Energy Technology Maturation Act of 2019
This bill requires the Department of Energy (DOE)to establish a funding program to facilitate the commercialization of energy and related technologies that exhibit promising commercial potential and are developed at DOE facilities.
